review: reaxing and enjoyable game. I've downloaded this before and have to download it again since my phone was changed. i immediately downloaded this wonderful game.

One of my favorite games simple for the fact its penguins. its an idle game so you can play at your own pace. the graphic design is cute, i love it.
I want to restart but I always get sent to where I left off I uninstalled the game many times but still keep my progress will change after my data gets deleted

i used to love this game, but now i don't even know why i keep it on my phone. there hasn't been a new real update since like 2? 3 years? that's such a pity, because it was so cute and cozy. I hope in the near future there will be new updates and just then I'll try to redownload this.

This game is nearly perfect relaxation for me, simple and adorable. I would be really grateful however if the screeching noise when inviting new penguins/leveling up spots was toned down please. It's really uncomfortable to listen to, especially with headphones, and it breaks the immersion

I used to have an account with this game, I still remember reaching Z coins actually. But, I stopped after seeing a whale, I have a phobia when it comes to huge stuff. I'm enjoying it right now, it's peaceful. Back then, there were not a lot of features. Unlike today, you have a lot of offers I can't afford yet but I was hoping there's an anti ad.

What happened the research? I've been at tier 32 for almost 2 years now with no updates (just says more to come please wait), no new recipes, nothing new,. Guess developers have given up on this game. The game used to be a lot more fun. No way to advance even if you pay actual money, which I'm not going to do because they don't care to update the game.
visuals good but much more time consuming game means you don't have to stop just continuously work that's why no time to enjoy the scenery and music.
Good idea, except it lags so bad I can't even play the game at all its just a waste of a good idea. what a shame

Love the game and have played for many years, but now, I'm often being redirected to Google Play Store by ads and then the game restarts and I lose the ad reward. It did make me wonder if you're doing this for extra ad revenue! However, the same is happening with other games (but not as often) so I suspect the issue is with one of your ad providers - please find out which one and tell them to stop!
The game is good and relaxing, but the ads suck, you can't even close some of the ads, you gotta close the game and restart every time an adult plays
this game has become almost unplayable due to ads constantly kicking you out of the game. fix this and I will continue playing and paying. otherwise I'll uninstall
ILY PENGUIN ISLE FOR BEING ON LAPTOP AAAAA I'm sad I can't load my data from a few years ago but that's alright I was failing anyways heh

Very Good Game. I remember playing this when I was 6 or 7, and I saw it on the app store and decided to give it a go again. I like the art style, which is quite simplistic. The only problem i have is if you weren't playing during the events, I don't think you can unlock the rewards such as special penguins after they're gone.
I love this game, absolutely my favourite game to play when I'm out and about. Super fun, awesome, cute penguins.

When I started playing this game a year or so ago the advertising was manageable and not overly intrusive. Recently returned to the game and the ads were so aggressive and repetitive I've uninstalled the game. Progress is tied to either watching ads or spending money, this game is worth neither the time or money for either option. Which is a shame because a couple of years ago this was a decent idle game.

I just realised I've been playing this app for nearly 5 years now. The cute penguins still amuse me! I've reached a pause awaiting new levels for the past 1-2 years or so? Feeling a bit glum that I can't push forward üòî

i can't even create the first fishing spot, my game is bugged even when i reinstalled it. Frustrating to not being able to play it

Gets boring too quickly once you reach to a certain point (specifically when you're unlocking the roller coaster). The monthly pass skins are often plain and boring. There should also be a daily reward where Day 15 could be a unique item that you could get in the event chest because there is no way I'm paying so much money for a chance to get a simple bush. I have purchased the monthly passes since April, and I might spend it elsewhere if the rewards are still super plain

I've played this game for a while, but a few years back I switched from iphone to android and I didn't see a way to transfer my data over. I don't know how or why I looked into it again, but I read someone had messaged their tech support on facebook and were able to transfer their account. I tried it, thinking it was a long shot, but they were super informative and were able to transfer my data! I'm so glad I can play again! Def one of my favorite games and highly recommend to anyone!
it is so chill and cozy, gives such a wonderful vibe anytime I play 10/10 and if you'll excuse me I'll be off to build my PENGUIN EMPIRE!

We can feel the money grabs starting to plague the penguins. The ads have gotten rough, advancing without paying $ takes HUGE amounts of investment now instead of a gradual growth as you play. Anyways, love the game, just needs a couple tweaks, and I wish the monthly ticket thing was cheaper.

really great and cute game. it flows very well and no intrusive ads! one downside though. when you watch ads for the treasure ship some of them force you to the playstore which crashes the game and you don't get your reward. ads that crash the game: foodventure,
Fun little cute game. But the idle time is limited to 2 hours. It's hardly an idle game if I have to check on it 8 times a day.

I mean aside from the ads (which is normal!) It's really well made. Good aesthetic, and it is a very calm and relaxing game. If you like games like this, I recommend *Cats & Soup* or *Alto's adventure*

I love this game, its simple and very adorable. However I am having issues with it, after unlocking the Hot Springs area, a hand pops up to tell me to tap. I tap everywhere and it just won't go away. Ive closed the app, opened it back up and its still there. I even uninstalled the whole game, reinstalled and restarted from the beginning, but after unlocking the same area it did the same thing. Its annoying its hovering in the middle of my screen no matter what I do or where I go. PLEASE FIX THIS
The new update isn't showing up in-game. I've updated it, but I'm not seeing anything about flight attendants and pilots.
Game restarts and in the tutorial I paid the first habitat and it reset and I did not get my gold back

The devs stopped trying with this game. There're no more new limited decorations in the updates, except for annual anniversaries. They even locked all the old ones under a lottery-like paywall. So, you can either collect free tickets for half a year to get 1 unique item or spend a lot of money. If you're a long-time player, there's nothing for you to do in the game anymore. And if you're new, you won't get the nice stuff others have. I don't think they will ever create a new location either.

I enjoyed this game overall. The graphics are cute, the gameplay is relaxing, and there are lots of things to do in the game. My only complaint is that if you don't play the game for a while, you get a dramatic letter from the penguins which guilts you into playing the game more. This was stressful and it was the main reason I uninstalled the game. There are some adds, but they aren't bad. Overall I liked the game.
I'm having plenty of fun with the game, but crashes. Needs update to fix this problem. Unstable. Game erased.

Played this game for two months and there is nothing relaxing about it. This game is nothing but watching the screen waiting for ads to watch. You cannot progress through the game without watching ads as they are an integral part of your islands advancement. The only part of this game I enjoyed was uninstalling it.
Finally I'm back and pick up where i left off. Thanks for helping me though, it takes 2 years before they fixed it. But, im glad that i got my progress back.
Gameplay consists of watching an increasing number of advertisements to progress as the quests for research points get more difficult. Not really fun to me...

Installs without permission. Malware. I don't care what excuse you make. Your game installed immediately upon reboot after an android security update. It is malware and you are scum. I don't play games on my phone. I do no not want or game and didn't accidentally click on anything. I watched it install and know what happened.

The game is great and watching them having fun around. The special even penguins are really adorable. I just installed it because of the food themed penguins. Hoping there's a chance you can get the previous ones.

I like this game, but most of the functions work when you watch ads, but my button to view ads is not active, so it became very difficult to play, when I tried to contact support about this problem, I did not receive an answer. Clear cache, reinstall game, check ad settings, none of this helped

To start, I love this game. I don't mind how ads are used; I can opt in or out. I'm happy to click ads to support developers when they're not forced on me. However, I've been getting incredibly frustrated by the types of ads. They're multilayer, requiring up to three clicks in different places, with 5-30 second delays before I am allowed to continue to the next "phase" of the ad. It's really frustrating that the ad structure makes me not want to play the actual game, which I do enjoy.
The 5th anniversary event is supposed to end today at 09:00, why you deleted it before time? Making me lose the rewards I was saving for buying staff... So irresponsible.
I don't know how to get seagull nest and I don't like how long it take to get decorations for my Isla and I don't like that it takes forever to expand my Isla.

Really cute. The game is pretty simple to follow and I like it. Unfortunately, since I've had the app for quite a awhile, there are no more habitat expansions for me to work towards! Please add some new habitats so I can keep playing! They also haven't added any new outfits or recipes in a LONG time. They used to add them a lot, but not any more. It would be nice to get some even occasionally...

Really good game and I'm enjoying playing it. There are a ton of little details in this game which shows they pay attention. HOWEVER I'm getting really tired of the ads. This game essentially forces you to use the ship and the gift features to progress quickly. These are super aggressive 60 second ads. Really breaks up the gameplay and gets in the way. Would I pay for the ad free? Absolutely if it wasn't 30 a MONTH! For a phone game! There are so many subscriptions that offer more for less.

I really like to play this game. This is fun but it usually force close in the loading screen. I dont know is this because my device doesn't work properly or the app not support. Maybe you can figure it out and tell the solution. Thank you
